website_summaries.verdict: Super cute retro glider gives you a great looking spot to rock.
pros: Offers an authentic vintage look with decorative cutouts
Doesn't glide too much – just offers a short rock
Also comes in red and white
cons: Not as easy to assemble as others on the market

customer_reviews.title: Parts came out of the box rusted
customer_reviews.text: Some of the parts came out of the box rusted. I will have to spray paint them before assembly or try to figure out how to pack the numerous pieces back into the box and haul the 60 pound box to the shipping store for a return. Very disappointed that I spent almost $200 for this kind of quality!
customer_reviews.author: LMS

customer_reviews.title: You better have a socket wrench
customer_reviews.text: It’s on our front porch. The paint job is super cheap. It was scratched before we assembled it. And if you don’t have a 10mm socket wrench just forget it because you’ll never be able to put it together with just what’s included. It looks used already but maybe with a better coat of paint. At day 1, it at least seems sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: colleen

customer_reviews.title: Beutiful. Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Took a little bit to put together, but is is just beautiful. I love it. Can't wait for the weather to warm up, so I can sit outside on it.
customer_reviews.author: janet

customer_reviews.title: Best outdoor buy yet!
customer_reviews.text: We love our retro style outdoor furniture! This glider is so comfortable and has a nice soothing glide...and no cushions necessary!
customer_reviews.author: M_M_M

customer_reviews.title: Not again
customer_reviews.text: This glider came already starting to rust. When put together and sit on it the seat rubs against the undercarraiage and bumps and makes noise. Would not buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry U

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: brother is hard to buy for. He and his wife loved this I was very pleased. Now I need to get me one. lol
customer_reviews.author: Deb Tanner

customer_reviews.title: I would DEFINITELY BUY IT AGAIN!💙👍💙
customer_reviews.text: Great outdoor furniture! Beautiful and VERY COMFORTABLE! I would DEFINITELY BUY IT AGAIN!💙👍💙
customer_reviews.author: Patricia R.

customer_reviews.title: Everything old is new, again!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. glides smoothly. Fits beautifully on our small front porch. Color looks great.
customer_reviews.author: PegS

customer_reviews.title: Consider this!
customer_reviews.text: This glider looks great, however the manufacturing is of the lowest quality... Bad welds, misaligned holes, nuts and bolts are undersized and lightweight and the instructions are vague. I think my money would have been better spent finding a quality piece of used patio furniture.
customer_reviews.author: sarra mossoff

customer_reviews.title: Survived a Deluge
customer_reviews.text: The product was shipped during a torrential downpour and arrived in a drenched cardboard box. Despite that challenge, all the pieces were there and it all fit together quite well. I recommend using a small socket wrench to supplement the 'temporary wrench' that came as part of the hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Lora Dora

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful slider. Easy assembly and will out last Nancy ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Beautiful slider. Easy assembly and will out last Nancy Pelosi. Maybe?
customer_reviews.author: Richard L. Depatta

customer_reviews.title: I love the finished chair
customer_reviews.text: Not the simplest item to put together, but it's well made and the directions are decent. Just make sure you have a ratchet set and don't rely on the little allen piece they give you. I love the finished chair.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew D'avanzo

customer_reviews.title: A charming retro glider at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This is a charming glider and an excellent value. We had no trouble assembling it.
customer_reviews.author: blueskies

product_meta.title: Coral Coast Paradise Cove Retro Metal Outdoor Glider Loveseat
